     1  package internal
     2  
     3  func Walk(v interface{}, fn func(v interface{}) interface{}) interface{} {
     4  	switch v := v.(type) {
     5  	case map[string]interface{}:
     6  		newMap := make(map[string]interface{}, len(v))
     7  		for key, value := range v {
     8  			newMap[key] = Walk(value, fn)
     9  		}
    10  		return fn(newMap)
    11  	case []interface{}:
    12  		newSlice := make([]interface{}, len(v))
    13  		for index, value := range v {
    14  			newSlice[index] = Walk(value, fn)
    15  		}
    16  		return fn(newSlice)
    17  	default:
    18  		return fn(v)
    19  	}
    20  }
